cardsSection.cardsSectionSubtitle: Cod is a concatinative stackbased language
cardsSection.card1Txt: Concativate programming languages are an untraditional pointer free programming paradigm with 'words' that denote functions that are called one by one.
cardsSection.card2Txt: COD primarily uses a stack based datastructure, a last in first out data structure. It combines this with a heap & variables to make the life of the programmer easier.
cardsSection.card3Txt: The source code of the COD compiler and all its tools are opensource and can be read, modified, and redistributed in any way you like using its repository on Github.
